title: The Quiet Axe
description: Forest Keeper Vael has discovered evidence of illegal logging in the Protected Grove — over a dozen mature trees have been taken in the past month. The trees are irreplaceable medicinal specimens. You must identify the loggers before more trees are taken.

turns.narrative: The stumps are clean cuts — professional equipment, not scavenging. Vael shows you the sawdust analysis: it contains a specific teak oil finish consistent with commercially maintained heavy saw blades. The operation is organised.
turns.choice_a: Stakeout the grove overnight to catch the loggers in the act
turns.consequence_a: A four-man crew arrives at midnight with professional equipment. You observe the operation completely before stepping out.
turns.choice_b: Trace the specific saw equipment by checking timber merchant licensing records
turns.consequence_b: Three licences for heavy forest equipment in the Ward match the saw profile. One — Timber Merchant Gos — has no documented work orders for this month but still has active saw crews.

turns.narrative: Timber Merchant Gos, when confronted, initially claims licenses permit some forest use. But the Protected Grove has an absolute prohibition — a status Gos was legally required to know.
turns.choice_a: Report Gos to the Ward Authority with the evidence for immediate prosecution
turns.consequence_a: Gos is arrested and faces a substantial fine plus mandatory replanting orders.
turns.choice_b: Negotiate directly with Gos for a replanting agreement as a condition of not prosecuting
turns.consequence_b: Gos agrees. He funds the replanting of twenty-four Grove-appropriate saplings under Vael's supervision.

turns.narrative: The grove needs immediate assessment and protection going forward.
turns.choice_a: Help Vael install basic perimeter monitoring — trip-line alerts on the three access paths
turns.consequence_a: Trip-lines are set. Any future entry triggers a Ward alert beacon.
turns.choice_b: Recommend the Ward Authority post a rotating night warden to the grove
turns.consequence_b: A paid night warden position is created. The grove gets its first dedicated guard.

gos_prosecuted.description: Gos arrested. Replanting ordered by court.

risk_matrix.critical_failure: The attempt failed quietly. The situation remains unresolved.

conclusion: Gos arrested. Replanting ordered by court.
